title: ₹90.9 Trillion Spent On Development In Last Eight Years: Finance Ministry | Mint - Mint
content: ₹90.9 Trillion Spent On Development In Last Eight Years: Finance Ministry | Mint  Mint
description: The statement said quoting RBI figures that the expenditure incurred by the Modi government includes  ₹24.85 trillion spent so far on food, fuel and fertiliser subsidies and  ₹26.3 trillion on capital creation
